nodes.documentation:
@title WhitelistedCrowdsale
@dev Crowdsale in which only whitelisted users can contribute.
nodes.name: WhitelistedCrowdsale

nodes.documentation: @dev Reverts if beneficiary is not whitelisted. Can be used when extending this contract.
nodes.name: isWhitelisted

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds single address to whitelist.
@param _beneficiary Address to be added to the whitelist
nodes.name: addToWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.
@param _beneficiaries Addresses to be added to the whitelist
nodes.name: addManyToWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes single address from whitelist.
@param _beneficiary Address to be removed to the whitelist
nodes.name: removeFromWhitelist
_preValidatePurchase

attributes.documentation:
@title WhitelistedCrowdsale
@dev Crowdsale in which only whitelisted users can contribute.
attributes.name: WhitelistedCrowdsale

attributes.documentation: @dev Reverts if beneficiary is not whitelisted. Can be used when extending this contract.
attributes.name: isWhitelisted

attributes.documentation:
@dev Adds single address to whitelist.
@param _beneficiary Address to be added to the whitelist
attributes.name: addToWhitelist

attributes.documentation:
@dev Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.
@param _beneficiaries Addresses to be added to the whitelist
attributes.name: addManyToWhitelist

attributes.documentation:
@dev Removes single address from whitelist.
@param _beneficiary Address to be removed to the whitelist
attributes.name: removeFromWhitelist
_preValidatePurchase

addManyToWhitelist(address[]).details: Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.

params._beneficiaries: Addresses to be added to the whitelist

params._beneficiary: Address to be added to the whitelist

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

params._beneficiary: Address to be removed to the whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
